lines.author: Guest
lines.text: *snort* Oh! Oh my, was I that tired that I fell asleep while standing?

lines.author: Clara
lines.text: Hello Uncle! As usual, these parties must be a bore for you.

lines.author: Uncle
lines.text: Indeed they are child, indeed they are... It's only because I like my little sister so much, your Mother, that I bother to come.

lines.author: Uncle
lines.text: ... As usual, I am at her beck and call...

lines.author: Clara
lines.text: I'm sorry it's that way for you! Still, I'm very happy to see you here. Say, after I'm done talking to the other guests, would you care for a dance?

lines.author: Clara
lines.text: (Poor Uncle... Mother keeps inviting him because she wants him to meet someone special...)
